vsParam:
Huh, what do you think, [px]?
My wings are beautiful today, right?

The hair conditioner I used was made of Puni's body fluid and
early morning dew drops. It will give my hair special luster!

That's right, Puni's body fluid!
Oh, this is a magic weapon for beauty.

I've had enough. You are so stupid, [px].
You couldn't appreciate my beauty. That's a big loss for you.

Ah, Peppermint, good morning!
Hee hee, you are kawaii today!

Yeah, and your wings are more shining than usual!
You are so fashionable, Peppermint!

Ah, good morning! I know, right? [px], see.
Those who can appreciate my beauty see the difference.

Ah, [px] Senpai, this is not OK!
You can't treat Peppermint with that attitude!

Yeah! Peppermint is basically the
mascot of the Academy!
You must love her more! Right?

See! Hee hee.
I am as kawaii as a mascot!

Oh, others in Fairyland would be shocked if they hear this...
They'd be amazed to see a fairy being complimented by humans.

Ah, a fairy? Ha ha ha, come on.
Although you are kawaii, Peppermint...

You don't strike me as a "fairy".
After all, fairies feel more elusive...

What! Th-that's not true!
I am a fairy, OK?

No, you don't look like a fairy at all... Ah!
I can't talk with you anymore. I'm late for class!

Ah, you are right!
Bye, Peppermint!

Hmm, don't tease me! And don't smirk!
I am a fairy! A real fairy!

Huh... It now looks like that I haven't done a good job in publicity!
Humph, those guys...

I'll let everyone in the Academy know that
I am a super super kawaii fairy one day!
